clearCache()

Clears the cache.
Source:
  • utils/Cacheable.js, line 44

destroy()

Destructor logic for the cacheable class. Clears the cache when destroyed. Make sure to invoke MyCacheableClass.base(this, 'destroy'); from implementers destroy.
Source:
  • utils/Cacheable.js, line 55
